description: Kaya is Erika and Iori`s mother. Estimated to be 251 years old and above, yet she looks like a child, giving people the image that she is Iori and Erika`s younger sister instead. Erika looks like a splitting image of her, the only difference being Erika`s more matured body and that Kaya`s eyes are constantly red in color, which every vampire has when they have their vampiric impulses.
name: Sendou Kaya
